title: Resume Builder Pro
description: Create a stunning professional resume in minutes

stepDescriptions.personalInfo: Tell us about yourself and make a great first impression
stepDescriptions.achievements: Showcase your key accomplishments and stand out from the crowd
stepDescriptions.workExperience: Detail your professional journey and career highlights
stepDescriptions.education: Share your educational background and academic achievements
stepDescriptions.projects: Highlight personal projects that demonstrate your skills
stepDescriptions.skills: Showcase your technical and soft skills that make you valuable

fastEasy.title: Fast & Easy
fastEasy.description: Create a professional resume in minutes with our intuitive step-by-step process.

beautifulTemplates.title: Beautiful Templates
beautifulTemplates.description: Choose from our collection of professionally designed resume templates.

atsOptimized.title: ATS Optimized
atsOptimized.description: Our resumes are optimized to pass through Applicant Tracking Systems.

tip1.title: Professional Email
tip1.description: Use a professional email address based on your name rather than nicknames or funny addresses.

tip2.title: Impactful Summary
tip2.description: Keep your summary concise (3-5 sentences) and highlight your most impressive qualifications and career goals.

tip3.title: Professional Photo
tip3.description: If including a photo, use a professional headshot with neutral background and appropriate attire.

tip4.title: Contact Details
tip4.description: Include only essential contact information and ensure all details are current and accurate.

tip1.title: Quantify Results
tip1.description: Use numbers and percentages to quantify your achievements (e.g., "Increased sales by 25%" rather than "Increased sales").

tip2.title: Results vs. Responsibilities
tip2.description: Focus on outcomes and results rather than listing job responsibilities to stand out from other candidates.

tip3.title: Awards & Recognition
tip3.description: Include relevant awards, recognitions, and honors that demonstrate your expertise and value.

tip4.title: Use Action Verbs
tip4.description: Start achievement descriptions with powerful action verbs like "achieved," "led," "implemented," or "created."

step1.title: PERSONAL INFORMATION
step1.uploadInstructions: Click to upload and crop your photo
step1.imageSizeError: File size should be less than 5MB
step1.imageTypeError: File should be JPEG, PNG, or GIF
step1.summaryPlaceholder: Briefly describe your professional background, key skills, and career goals
step1.summaryTip: A strong summary helps you stand out. Keep it concise and impactful.

cropInstructions.drag: ‚Ä¢ Drag the image to position it
cropInstructions.zoom: ‚Ä¢ Use the zoom slider to resize
cropInstructions.cropArea: ‚Ä¢ The circle shows your crop area

step2.title: ACHIEVEMENTS
step2.noAchievements: No achievements added yet. Add your first achievement below.

step3.title: EXPERIENCE
step3.endDateTip: Leave empty if this is your current position
step3.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your responsibilities, achievements, and skills used in this role
step3.descriptionTip: Use bullet points for better readability. Focus on accomplishments rather than duties.

step4.title: EDUCATION
step4.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your achievements, GPA, relevant coursework, etc.
step4.descriptionTip: Highlight relevant courses, honors, or extracurricular activities related to your career goals.

step5.title: PROJECTS
step5.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the project, technologies used, and your role
step5.descriptionTip: Highlight the purpose, technologies used, and your specific contributions.

step6.title: SKILLS
step6.skillsDescription: Add skills relevant to the positions you're applying for
step6.skillPlaceholder: e.g. JavaScript, Project Management, Data Analysis
step6.tip1: Include a mix of technical (hard) skills and interpersonal (soft) skills
step6.tip2: Prioritize skills mentioned in the job descriptions you're targeting
step6.tip3: Be specific with technical skills (e.g., "React.js" instead of just "JavaScript")

messages.referencesAvailableOnRequest: Professional references will be provided upon request

forms.headshotTip: Upload a professional headshot. Recommended: 400x400px, JPG or PNG
forms.placeholderSummary: Brief professional summary highlighting your key achievements, skills, and career objectives...
forms.placeholderDegree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
